Title: Thirst

Studio: CJ Entertainment 
Director: Park Chan-wook 
Screenwriter: Park Chan-wook Seo-Gyeong Jeong & 
Starring: Song Kang-ho, Kim Ok Bin, Mercedes Cabral, Sin Ha-gyoon, Kim Hae-sook 


Synopsis: 
"Thirst" tells the story of Sang-hyun (Kang-Ho), a Catholic priest who spends his time helping the sick in a hospital. Straight and kind, she travels to Africa and offer their body to science to investigate it a new vaccine. Unfortunately the side effects that produce the vaccine are immediate and unexpected: the good priest becomes a thirsty vampire. After the transformation begins to feel a burning desire that I had never known before: selfishness, violence and sex, through the terrible attraction to the wife of his best friend. Next to it will soon begin to discover the pleasures of the flesh and blood. 

Production notes: 
- Winner of the Jury Prize at the Cannes Film Festival 2009 and won the award for Best Actress for Kim Ok-bin in the Festival de Sitges 2009.
